# programQuery

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function programQuery<TProgramType extends ProgramType>(
  queryClient: QueryClient,
  sdk: RequiredParam<ThirdwebSDK>,
  address: RequiredParam<string>,
  type?: TProgramType,
): {
  queryKey: readonly [
    "__tw__",
    "sol",
    RequiredParam<import("@thirdweb-dev/sdk/solana").Network>,
    "program-instance",
    RequiredParam<string>,
    {
      readonly persist: false;
    },
  ];
  queryFn: () => Promise<ProgramMap[TProgramType]>;
  enabled: boolean;
  cacheTime: number;
  staleTime: number;
};
```

## Parameters

| Parameter   | Type                                                         | Description       |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------- |
| queryClient | QueryClient                                                  |                   |
| sdk         | [RequiredParam](./react.requiredparam.md)&lt;ThirdwebSDK&gt; |                   |
| address     | [RequiredParam](./react.requiredparam.md)&lt;string&gt;      |                   |
| type        | TProgramType                                                 | <i>(Optional)</i> |

**Returns:**

{ queryKey: readonly \["\_\_tw\_\_", "sol", [RequiredParam](./react.requiredparam.md)&lt;import("@thirdweb-dev/sdk/solana").Network&gt;, "program-instance", [RequiredParam](./react.requiredparam.md)&lt;string&gt;, { readonly persist: false; }\]; queryFn: () =&gt; Promise&lt;ProgramMap\[TProgramType\]&gt;; enabled: boolean; cacheTime: number; staleTime: number; }
